notes: Modern, well-maintained apartment with clean white finishes, recessed LED lighting, and stainless steel appliances. The unit has a balcony with floor-to-ceiling glass doors which will need baby gates or guards once the child is mobile. Living space appears clean with minimal sharp corners on furniture; the bar stools are somewhat unstable for a home with a toddler. Being on 3F of a 15-story building strongly suggests elevator access.
